ci.prTitle: feat: Make project cards clickable with navigation (Issue #138)
feat: Make project cards clickable with navigation (Issue #138)

specs.title: homepage loads successfully
API health check is responding
API projects endpoint returns data
can create a project via UI
displays empty state when no projects exist
form validation prevents empty project name
can perform CRUD operations via API
should create a new project with name and description
should create project with only name (no description)
should show empty state and transition to project list after first creation
should allow creating multiple projects sequentially
should show validation error for empty project name
should reject whitespace-only project name
should handle very long project names
should handle special characters in project name
should show error when creating project with duplicate name
should detect duplicate names case-insensitively
should close form without creating project when cancelled
should show loading state during project creation
should handle rapid form submissions
should persist form data when validation fails
should handle projects with emoji in name
should display all existing projects
should show empty state when no projects exist
should display all project information correctly
should select project and show in header

specs.title: should navigate to project detail page when clicking card
should update URL correctly for different projects
should navigate using keyboard Enter key
should navigate using keyboard Space key
should show cursor pointer on hover
should show hover background change
should maintain hover styles across all project cards
should delete project without triggering navigation
should handle rapid clicks - card then delete
should maintain delete functionality after navigation
should cancel delete without navigation side effects
should handle clicking on text within card
should handle clicking on status badge
should handle clicking near card edges
should work with single project in list
should work with many projects in list
should support browser back button after navigation
should support browser forward button after back navigation
should maintain navigation history for multiple projects
